ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then We draw them back to Ourselves in gradual steps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then We draw it back to Us, withdrawing it little by little.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: then (as the sun climbs up), We roll it up little by little towards Ourselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Then He reduces it in gradual steps.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We then gradually withdraw it towards Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then We withdraw it towards Ourselves -- a gradual withdrawal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then We take it to Ourselves, taking little by little.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: thereafter We seize it to Ourselves, drawing it gently.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then We withdraw it unto Us, a gradual withdrawal?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: then We withdrew it to Us, a gradual withdrawal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then We draw it toward Us with an easy drawing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then We retract it toward Ourselves, with a gentle retracting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then We draw it in towards Ourselves,- a contraction by easy stages.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then We withdraw it to Us a gradual concealed withdrawal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: thereafter We seize it to Us withdrawing it gently.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then We withdraw it towards Us gradually.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then We hold it in hand for a brief grasp.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [25:46] Then We retract it, the extended shadow, to Us by gentle retraction, subtle [retraction], through the rising of the sun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then We withdraw it) i.e. the shade (unto Us, a gradual withdrawal) a slight-or as it is said: hidden- withdrawal?
